        Find a set of importers that support a given mime type

        Returns:

      • importData

        public static CommsMapComponent.ImportResult importData​(java.io.InputStream in,
                                                        android.os.Bundle bundle)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Given an inputStream and a bundle, attempt to determine the content type and mime type for the stream, then call importData.
        Parameters:
        in - the input stream be be used with a maximal probe size of 64kb or less
        bundle - the bundle that could contain extra information
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
